result.execSummary:
The defendant Christopher J Stocks Jr. was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Manuf/Deliver Schedule I, II Narcotics, a class E felony, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(1)(a).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt:
13CM617, 14CF52, 14CF70, 14CF333, 12CT308 & 327: Defendant Christopher J Stocks Jr in court, in custody with attorney Jessica Marie Moeller.  Yolanda J. Tienstra appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Def. will plead today; 12CT308 & 327 are motions to revoke DPA, Atty. Moeller notes that warrants to be quashes on those and will be requesting restitution hearing in 13CM671; Court quashes any outstanding warrants; Court notes in CT cases, there is DPA and will grant State's request to revoke DPA; Court finds cause and revokes DPA in 12CT308 & 327 and will D&RI; Court reviews recomm. as to all charges; State notes that 2 CT cases are not to be D&RI and are recomm. 6 mo. conc.; victim rights complied with; Court reviews all charges/penalties; Def. pleads Guilty  to BJ in Count 1 of 14CF52, Guilty to Poss. of Narcotic Drugs in Count 1 of 14CF70, Guilty to Manuf./Del. Narcotics in 14CF333 and Guilty to Theft in 13CM617; Court reviews GPQPA & WOR; discussion on facts; Court finds pleas made FVK&I and finds Def. guilty of Count 1 in 14CF52, Count 1 in 14CF70, charge in 14CF333, charge in 13CM617 with all other counts D&RI, DPAs are revoked in 12CT308 & 327 and Def. is found guilty of OAR; State heard; Atty. Moeller heard; Def. makes statement; Court imposes sentence; Def. remanded

Sentence credit is left open at this time
14CF52 & 14CF70: 3 years in WI State Prison System consecutive to Waukesha 14CF209, concurrent with each other

* DNA sample if not already provided
* Yes to ERP and CIP

14CF52, 13CM617, 14CF70, 14CF333 - Defendant Christopher J Stocks in court, in custody with attorney Jessica Marie Moeller.  Yolanda J. Tienstra appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Parties waive prelim. Court accepts waiver and proceeds to argn. Informations filed. Review of info is waived; not guilty plea entered; 10 days mtns; stc set; bail con't; All cases to track with 14CF52 for now;  Telephone scheduling conference scheduled for September 8, 2015 at 08:30 am.
To Sheriff's Dept - Notification of Served Warrants

14CF52, 14CF70, 14CF333, 13CM617 - Defendant Christopher J Stocks in court, in custody by phone from DCI with attorney Jessica M. Moeller (has in 3 of the cases, will be appointed on last one).  Kurt Frederich Klomberg appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   Defendant has received copy of Criminal Complaint and advised of rights, charges, penalties and right to Preliminary Hearing. Court finds probable cause. Prelim requested, waiving time limits. Prelim set. Court sets $1000 PA bond without specific conditions.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for August 6, 2015 at 08:30 am.
